QuestData.Title: Get to High Ground
QuestData.Description: It is no accident that Dargrul attacked the Rivermane in force. It is their farms and their pastures that supply food for the region.$b$bPlease, get Jale to Thunder Totem. With luck, Mayla will have reinforcements to send to the area.$b$bWe will rally the survivors here and follow as quickly as we can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Jale Rivermane to Thunder Totem.
QuestData.RewardText: Riverbend was... destroyed? That disgusting beast Dargrul! I will not stop until I see him dead.$b$bBut we cannot do that with the army we have.$b$bWe need help from the other tribes.

Objectives.Objective: Lead Jale Rivermane to Thunder Totem
